mapper.sql: id, deviceid, val, warning_value, collect_time, warning_level, remark, status
mapper.select: select wr.* from tm_warning_records wr where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update tm_warning_records set deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, val = #{val,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warning_value = #{warningValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, collect_time = #{collectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, warning_level = #{warningLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
